reviews.review_text: Highly recommended shack with a super chilled and laid-back vibe. No pressure to upsell services or rack up your bill. The bathrooms are clean and hygienic, which is always a plus. While the service can be on the slower side for food (drinks come out quickly), it’s Goa — you’re here to drink, relax, and unwind! I’ve seen people sit here for hours nursing one drink (but that doesn’t mean you should misuse it). It’s located in a more secluded part of the beach, making it less crowded, and they even have a small library. Definitely worth visiting!

Average food and great location. The atmosphere is a bit less lively for the location. There was a music band playing live music in the evening we visited. A little expensive but good food when combined with the beach side seating.
Service is a little slow but friendly. Overall a great place for a secluded yet public vibe with beach side views.

We had an absolutely unforgettable experience! The Rock and King Fish starters were exquisitely delicious, perfectly setting the tone for the evening. The Jungle Juice cocktails were a delightful treat, bursting with flavor and truly exceptional. The ambiance was nothing short of impressive, offering a serene atmosphere that becomes even more breathtaking as the sun rises. The staff, including the owner, were incredibly welcoming and attentive, always ready with excellent food recommendations. The addition of a billiards table provided a fun and social element, allowing guests to unwind while making lasting connections. A truly remarkable experience overall!
